info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 28 at 8:46AM CDT until May 28 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
FFWEWX
The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Bandera County in south central Texas... Northwestern Bexar County in south central Texas... Kendall County in south central Texas... Southeastern Kerr County in south central Texas... Northeastern Medina County in south central Texas...
* Until 1000 AM CDT.
* At 846 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain and several low water crossings are still reported flooded. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... San Antonio, Kerrville, Boerne, Comfort, Bandera, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Cross Mountain, Kronkosky State Natural Area, Pipe Creek, Bandera Falls, Nelson City, Welfare, Lakehills, Center Point, Walnut Grove, Waring, Camp Verde and Cypress Creek.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:00 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:00 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Bandera, TX; Bexar, TX; Kendall, TX; Kerr, TX; Medina, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:00 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:00 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Bandera, TX; Bexar, TX; Kendall, TX; Kerr, TX; Medina, TX
